text: Huesca (; ) is a city in north-eastern Spain, within the autonomous community of Aragon. It is also the capital of the Spanish province of the same name and of the comarca of Hoya de Huesca. ==References== ==Other websites== *Council of Huesca *Huesca Film Festival *CDAN, Centre of Art and Nature *Diario Del Alto Arag√≥n *Virtual Tour around Huesca *Excursiones por Huesca *Fiestas de San Lorenzo Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Settlements in Huesca
title: Huesca
